personalStatement: Motivated and detail-oriented Bachelor of Science Information Technology graduate with strong foundations in software development and mobile app design. Seeking an opportunity as a Software Developer or Android App Developer to apply skills in Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and Kotlin for building efficient and user-friendly applications. Known for being a quick learner, team player, and passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

projects.name: Hanzala.co (E-Commerce Website)
projects.description: Developed a full-fledged e-commerce platform with product listing, shopping cart, and authentication features.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and deployed a responsive personal portfolio website to showcase projects and technical skills.

achievements.title: Best Student Project Award
achievements.description: Awarded for outstanding project work in Information Technology, demonstrating exceptional technical skills and innovation.

achievements.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Certificate
achievements.description: Completed comprehensive course covering JavaScript ES6+, DOM manipulation, and modern web development practices.

achievements.title: React Developer Certificate
achievements.description: Advanced React.js certification covering hooks, context, state management, and modern React patterns.
